answers.answer: The dopomoha.ro flyer provides general information from DOPOMOHA.RO.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/share and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: People can effectively share dopomoha.ro content by printing and displaying posters in crowded places, and by distributing flyers wherever they go, such as in stores or parks.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/share and read the section under 'Share the dopomoha.ro content where it is most needed'.

answers.answer: The dopomoha.ro poster is recommended to be displayed in crowded places visible to people, such as storefronts and apartment buildings.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/share and read the section under 'Share the dopomoha.ro content where it is most needed'.

answers.answer: The guide with common expressions covers Romanian, English, and Ukrainian languages.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/share and read the section under 'Click here for the phrase book'.

answers.answer: The phrase book contains common expressions translated between Romanian, English, and Ukrainian, which can assist individuals in communication.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/share and read the section under 'Click here for the phrase book'.

answers.answer: Through Sprijin de Urgență, individuals can request resources, food, products, clothing, tents, transportation, or volunteers.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/share and read the section under 'Sprijin de Urgență'.

answers.answer: Someone can offer volunteer support via Sprijin de Urgență by using the 'Request or provide resources' option.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/share and read the section under 'Sprijin de Urgență'.

answers.answer: Sprijin de Urgență addresses needs for resources, food, products, clothing, tents, transportation, and volunteers.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/share and read the section under 'Sprijin de Urgență'.

answers.answer: Individuals can provide resources or products on Sprijin de Urgență by using the 'Request or provide resources' option.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/share and read the section under 'Sprijin de Urgență'.

answers.answer: Un Acoperiș offers support in finding temporary accommodation for vulnerable people who are now coming to Romania.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/share and read the section under 'Un Acoperiș'.

answers.answer: Someone can provide a space for vulnerable people through Un Acoperiș by accessing Un Acoperiș and choosing to 'Search or offer accommodation'.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/share and read the section under 'Un Acoperiș'.
